mapper.select: SELECT o.*, og.good_id,good.`name` as good_name, og.count, og.standard, good.imgs FROM t_order o, order_goods og ,good WHERE o.id = og.order_id AND o.user_id = #{userId} AND og.good_id = good.id ORDER BY o.create_time DESC

SELECT og.good_id,good.`name` as good_name, og.standard,gs.price ,good.discount ,og.count, good.imgs FROM t_order o, order_goods og ,good,good_standard gs WHERE o.id = og.order_id AND o.order_no = #{orderNo} AND og.good_id = good.id AND gs.good_id = og.good_id AND gs.`value` = standard
